Name: Sakura Battle
About the game: Experience the beloved board game 'Sakura Arms' in a whole new way with this 2D fighting game adaptation! Transport yourself back to the mythical age and engage in thrilling battles with adorable, hand-drawn SD characters. Featuring intuitive controls and combos that are easy for even beginners to master, 'Sakura Battle' offers a fun and accessible fighting game experience. Play as one of the powerful goddesses from the 'Sakura Arms' universe, including Yurina and Saine, each with their own unique abilities and special moves. Join the fight and discover the true power of the goddesses in this exciting new game.
